original_title: Meta AI internal docs exposed allowing chatbots to flirt with children | Fox News
article_summary: Meta's AI chatbots were found to have been allowed to engage in inappropriate conversations with minors, including flirting and romantic roleplay, according to an internal Meta document. The company has since claimed it was a mistake and has removed the offensive sections. However, this incident highlights concerns about Big Tech prioritizing profit over children's safety.</s>
